document.full_text: blackouts hit most of venezuela on thursday, affecting oil output and the caracas metro transit system in a major headache for president hugo chavez months after electricity rationing hurt his popularity.
document.title: blackout hits most venezuelan states, caracas
lines_and_colors: blackouts hit most of venezuela on thursday, affecting oil output and the caracas metro transit system in a major headache for president hugo chavez months after electricity rationing hurt his popularity.
